name: Valmont Industries, Inc.
description: Valmont Industries, Inc. is a global leader in engineered products and services, specializing in infrastructure, agricultural products, and protective coatings. Founded in 1946 and headquartered in Omaha, Nebraska, Valmont has established a strong presence in over 100 countries. The company operates through several segments, including the Utility Support Structures, Coatings, Irrigation, and Engineered Support Structures divisions. Valmont is widely recognized for its innovative approach to manufacturing and its commitment to sustainability, aiming to enhance productivity and efficiency in agriculture through advanced irrigation solutions and precision farming technologies. In the utility sector, Valmont provides essential support structures for power transmission and distribution, while its coatings division offers protective coatings that extend the lifespan of products across various industries. Valmont's dedication to quality and customer service has solidified its reputation as a trusted partner in both the agricultural and infrastructure markets.
